lessonTopics: Lesson 1: Integrative Health Foundation - What integrative health is, bridging conventional and holistic care, 5 root causes of chronic health issues, scope of practice for health coaches
Lesson 2: The B.R.I.D.G.E. Method - Biological assessment, Root cause discovery, Integrative protocols, Daily lifestyle optimization, Gut-brain connection, Emotional wellness framework
Lesson 3: Getting Your First Clients - Warm market strategy for healthcare professionals, pricing packages, income math, 30-day launch plan for integrative practice
painPoints: Seeing the same patients return with chronic issues that medications alone don't solve
Feeling limited by conventional protocols that treat symptoms instead of root causes
Knowing there's a better way but lacking the framework to bridge medical and holistic approaches
Watching patients suffer while the healthcare system focuses on quick fixes
Burned out from traditional healthcare but still passionate about helping people heal
Helping friends and family with integrative advice for free but no professional structure or income
terminology: Integrative health - combining conventional medicine with evidence-based complementary approaches for whole-person wellness
B.R.I.D.G.E. Method - Biological, Root cause, Integrative, Daily lifestyle, Gut-brain, Emotional wellness framework
5 Root Causes - Chronic inflammation, gut dysbiosis, hormonal imbalance, toxic overload, nervous system dysregulation
Functional approach - addressing underlying causes rather than suppressing symptoms
Lifestyle medicine - using diet, movement, sleep, stress management as primary interventions
Mind-body connection - understanding how mental and emotional states affect physical health
Scope of practice - educate and support lifestyle changes without diagnosing, prescribing, or replacing medical care
clientExamples: Women 40-55 with chronic fatigue, autoimmune issues, or mystery symptoms doctors can't explain
Healthcare professionals experiencing burnout and their own chronic health issues
People on multiple medications who want to address root causes, not just manage symptoms
Those who feel dismissed by conventional medicine and want someone who listens to their full story
Anyone seeking a bridge between their doctor's care and holistic wellness approaches
practiceType: Integrative health coaching focused on root cause assessment, lifestyle medicine protocols, gut health optimization, stress management, and bridging conventional and holistic care
